Summary: flew over home in a ese direction, thoght nothig of it, plane right? came straight back slow down hovered, started glowing bright reddish orange yellow mostly red,
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Lee's Summit
There was one other sighting in Lee's Summit on or around October 1st 2011
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailsi dont really like sharing this on the web. i know what i saw, and it was not a aircraft thats common. my dad was a pilot for 37 years, i grew up around all sorts of craft. thought it was just another plane. but the weird stuff changed everything for me. i just don't know. i was at home at the time. went outside to have a smoke. went inside,busted up the stairs to get someone else to see and help explain. took less than approx. 10 secs to get to upstairs deck. there was nothing in the sky at that time.i felt like an idiot. but what i saw was real, and have no explanation,none. it still spooks me to some degree.
